```bash
BEGIN:VCARD
VERSION:3.0
FN:Shawn Kelly
TITLE:Vet Outreach Coordinator

EMAIL;TYPE=work:skelly@lockard.llc

TEL;TYPE=work:[Google Voice TBD]
NOTE:Public contact for clinic partnerships and scheduling.
END:VCARD
```

**Note:** Use `\\n` when embedding into code strings; .vcf prefers CRLF but `\\n` works in browsers.
